comprehensive_overview: libwpe is a library that provides web platform support for Wayland compositors and other clients that need web content rendered on a Wayland surface.
core_features: 1. Provides a WebKit rendering engine for Wayland compositors. 2. Enables seamless integration of web content within Wayland-based applications. 3. Supports modern web standards and technologies. 4. Offers APIs for customizing and controlling the behavior of web content on Wayland surfaces.
